name: Robo Dude
description:
Relax, listen to the music, and enter through all the checkpoints!! (Coins are optional bonus)

Each vehicle handles very differently, and not so easily, so it may take some practice.

Controls:

1 - Transform into Robot

2 - Transform into Car

3 - Transform into a Plane

4 - Transform into a freaking train!

Note:

Press shift + a or shift + d to pitch roll the car in the air

Credits:

Chem57 - Music Theme (From the One Synth Challenge #93)

Flying Ship Model - from https://sketchfab.com/lite
